CustomField.formula: IF((Start_Date__c <= TODAY()) && (ISBLANK(End_Date__c) || (End_Date__c > TODAY())), 'Active', IF((End_Date__c < TODAY() || Inactive_MDU__c = True), 'Inactive', IF(ISBLANK(Start_Date__c) && ISBLANK(End_Date__c), 'Pending Activation', IF(Start_Date__c > TODAY(), 'Pending Activation', 'Inactive' )) ) )
CustomField.label: Status
